Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Requires the governor's tax expenditure reporting to include an enumeration of all fossil fuel related tax expenditures
Summary: Requires the governor's tax expenditure reporting to include an enumeration of all fossil fuel related tax expenditures; imposes a 5 year expiration upon any fossil fuel related tax expenditures enacted.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring an annual report of all fossil fuel related tax expenditures; and to provide for the expiration of fossil fuel related tax expenditures
